testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I want to open chrome browser.........................................passed And User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed When User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin".....passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then Page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User clicks on logout link.............................................passed When User clicks on logout link.............................................passed Then Page title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed
